name: HH_TRIAGE_CODE_HX
description: This table contains audit history of the triage code for a patient during a home care episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRIAGE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Auditing history of the triage code for a patient during a home care episode.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Auditing history of the ID of the user who edited the triage code for a patient during a home care episode.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Auditing history of the instant at which edits were made to the triage code for a patient during a home care episode.
